note.p: Death: Queens' College Chapel, Cambridge (01 April 1820)

Career: Weaver; Usher in a school taught by his brother (1768); ordained deacon (1775); ordained priest (1777); Rector of St Botolph, Cambridge (1778-1792); First Jacksonian Professor of Natural Philosophy, Cambridge; President of Queen's College (1788); Dean of Carlisle (1791); Vice Chancellor of Cambridge (1792); Lucasian Professor of Mathematics (1798)
